Description_lang: After using Power Word: Barrier or Divine Hymn, the mana cost of your healing spells is reduced by $105826s1% for $?s10060[10 sec][$105826d].

name_blz.en_US: Item - Priest T13 Healer 2P Bonus (Power Word: Barrier and Divine Hymn)
name_blz.es_MX: Item - Priest T13 Healer 2P Bonus (Power Word: Barrier and Divine Hymn)
name_blz.pt_BR: Item - Sacerdote T13 Curador 2P Bônus (Palavra de Poder: Barreira e Hino Divino)
name_blz.en_GB: Item - Priest T13 Healer 2P Bonus (Power Word: Barrier and Divine Hymn)
name_blz.es_ES: Item - Priest T13 Healer 2P Bonus (Power Word: Barrier and Divine Hymn)
name_blz.it_IT: Item - Priest T13 Healer 2P Bonus (Power Word: Barrier and Divine Hymn)

description_blz.en_US: After using Power Word: Barrier or Divine Hymn, the mana cost of your healing spells is reduced by 25% for 23 sec.
description_blz.es_MX: Después de usar Palabra de poder: barrera o Himno divino, el costo de maná de tus hechizos de sanación se reduce un 25% durante 23 s.
description_blz.pt_BR: Depois de usar Palavra de Poder: Barreira ou Hino Divino, o custo de mana dos seus feitiços de cura é reduzido em 25% por 23 s.
description_blz.de_DE: Nach dem Einsatz von 'Machtwort: Barriere' oder 'Gotteshymne' werden die Manakosten Eurer Heilzauber 23 Sek. lang um 25% verringert.
description_blz.en_GB: After using Power Word: Barrier or Divine Hymn, the mana cost of your healing spells is reduced by 25% for 23 sec.
description_blz.es_ES: Tras usar Palabra de poder: barrera o Himno divino, el coste de maná de tus hechizos de sanación se reduce un 25% durante 23 s.
description_blz.fr_FR: Lorsque vous avez utilisé Mot de pouvoir : Barrière ou Hymne divin, le coût en mana de vos sorts de soins est réduit de 25% pendant 23 s.
description_blz.it_IT: Dopo aver usato Parola del Potere: Barriera o Inno Divino, il costo in mana dei tuoi incantesimi di cura si riduce del 25% per 23 s.
description_blz.ru_RU: После применения "Слова силы: Барьер" или "Божественного гимна" стоимость исцеляющих заклинаний снижается на 25% на 23 сек.
description_blz.ko_KR: 신의 권능: 방벽 또는 천상의 찬가를 시전한 후 23초 동안 치유 주문에 소비되는 마나가 25%만큼 감소합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 在使用真言術：壁或神聖禮頌之後，你的治療法術的法力消耗降低25%，持續23秒。
description_blz.zh_CN: 在使用真言术：障或神圣赞美诗之后，你的治疗法术法力值消耗降低25%，持续23秒。
